commitResults.messageTitle: Add confirmation for clear command functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
Added a flag isPendingClearConfirmation into Model.java. The flag essentially is the
status of whether or not the model is awaiting a clear confirmation, after the user
has first typed 'clear'.

User now has to type 'clear confirm' after typing 'clear' to successfully initiate
a full clear of the student list. Typing 'clear confirm' before typing 'clear' will
prompt the user to type 'clear' first.:
